name: Koopaling Battles
description:
Koopaling Battles is a full fledged 3d reimagination & recriation of some of the iconic 2d bosses battles of the New Super Mario Bros Wii & U games and their diverse & interesting mechanics all done by me in Unreal Engine 5.1 in a Mario 64 type level selector where you jump to pictures to select the many boss battles that the game provides you!

Attention!! : the level design on this game is a bit rudimentar because this was  a project where I only wanted to recrete the mechanics so I didn't add much to the arena levels and I just wanted to have fun!

Note:

Ifr any bug ocurres during your gameplay, report me imediately, I want this game to be a perfect experinece!
